title: Hurricane Melissa live: Jamaica braces amid ‘catastrophic’ threat as category 5 storm approaches
summary: A powerful hurricane, expected to make landfall on the island by Tuesday morning, is set to be the strongest recorded since the 1850s. Authorities are preparing for severe impacts as the storm approaches. Residents are urged to take precautions and follow safety guidelines.

title: Australia politics live: Marles derides Coalition ‘clown show’ over PM’s Trump meeting; Watt says he was right to reject climate trigger in nature laws
summary: Please provide the news article or the specific details you'd like summarized, and I'll help you with that!

title: CSL records ‘second strike’ from shareholders over controversial executive pay plans
summary: At a biotech company's recent annual general meeting, over 40% of shareholder votes were against the proposed plans. Despite this significant opposition, the company's board managed to retain its position. The vote reflects growing discontent among shareholders regarding the direction of the company.

title: RBA governor dismisses jobs fears but hints at rates hold after inflation uptick
summary: Michele Bullock has addressed worries about increasing unemployment rates, suggesting that they may not be a significant concern. Economists are predicting that the next cut in borrowing costs could occur in February. Overall, Bullock's remarks aim to reassure the public amidst economic uncertainty.

title: Queensland’s controversial puberty blocker ban overturned by supreme court
summary: A parent of a transgender child has successfully contested the Crisafulli government's ban on treatment for individuals under 18. The court ruling allows continued access to necessary healthcare for transgender minors. This decision marks a significant victory for LGBTQ+ rights advocates and families seeking support.
